desc_program:
Presbyterian church
* offers Bible studies
* features a youth group
* Sunday morning nursery and Sunday School
* adult choir
* discussion group
* offers a Wednesday night dinner and programmes
* Congregational dinners and lunches
* a social group for young families
* a social group for older adults
* Dinner and a Movie group
* Knitting group (thurs. afternoons)

* hosts South Windsor Seniors club
* T.O.P.S.
*Soul to Sole Dance for handicap children
*Alanon
*Sweet Strings (dulcimers group)
*Tues. afternoon line dancing

Free / Low Cost Meals;Free / Low-cost meals;Homeless meals;Homeless Shelters;Homeless Shelters / Drop-Ins
desc_program:
Drop-in program * monthly Homeless Memorial, including community lunch

Member agency of Toronto Drop-in Network (TDIN)
hours:
Summer Drop-in, July-August -- Mon 1:30 pm-3 pm, Tue-Fri 11 am-3 pm, Sun 8 am-1 pm
Drop-in, September-June -- Mon-Fri 11 am-3 pm, Sun 8 am-1 pm
Throughout the year: Light breakfast -- Sun 8 am * Homeless Memorial -- every 2nd Tue of each month at 12 noon, followed by community lunch at 12:45 pm
eligibilty:
Open to all

Residency Requirements: Downtown Toronto

category: Free / Low Cost Meals;Free / Low-cost meals;Meals for seniors / people with disabilities
desc_program:
Hot Meal Programs available - see below for date, time and location:

Breakfast Programs:

Local Community Food Centre, 612 Erie St - every Thu at 8:30 am (PER1902) - no meals Dec 23 to Jan 2

Lunch programs:

For Seniors 60 and older - Local Community Food Centre, 612 Erie St - every Wed at 11:30 am (PER1902) - no meals Dec 23 to Jan 2

Dinner programs:


Christian Reform Church,(CRC) 190 Athlone Cres - Nov to Apr @ 5:15 p.m. - First Tues of the month except Jan 2 plus some other Tue: Nov 21st, Jan 16, Jan 30, Feb 20 and Mar 20 (PER0193)

Knox Church, 142 Ontario St, Stratford - Oct to May - 5:15 pm - third Fri of the month plus Oct 13, Dec 6, Feb 9 and Apr 31 (PER0246)

Local Community Food Centre, (LCFC) 612 Erie St, Stratford - Mon 5:15 pm * Year round (PER1902) * no meals at Local Dec 23 to Jan 2

Parkview Church, 470 Ontario St, Stratford - Nov to Apr @ 5:15 p.m. - 1st Thu (PER0255)

Rotary Complex, 353 McCarthy Rd, Stratford - Once a year in Dec 16, 2017 ONLY - To Straford with Love

St Andrews Church, 25 St Andrew St, Stratford - Every except second Wednesday (see Avon Mennonite below)Wed 5:30 pm-6:30 pm (doors open at 5:15 pm) Nov-Apr (PER2202)

St James Anglican, 6 Hamilton St, Stratford - Dec 25th only at 12 noon (PER2539)

St. James Anglican, 6 Hamilton St. Stratford - Fri Dec 1, Feb 2, Mar 2, Apr 6 @ 5:15

St Joseph's Church, 96 Huron St, Stratford -3rd Thu each month at 5 pm * year round (PER0249)

St Pauls Church, 9 Douro St, Stratford * Nov to Apr @ 5:15 p.m. * - Tue when not available at Christian Reform Church - Nov 14, Nov 28, Dec.12, Dec. 19, Dec. 26, Jan. 9, Jan. 23, Feb 27, Mar 13, Mar 27,Apr 13, Apr 17(PER0062)

Zion Church, 202 Erie St, Stratford - Oct to May @ 5 p.m. - Fourth Fri. of every month except Dec 22 and Mar 23 ( PER2203)

Avondale United Church, 194 Avondale Ave, Stratford -Oct to May @ 5:15 Meals last sun * No meals in Dec(24 and 31) (PER0223)

Avon Mennonite Church - 90 Greenwood Court, Stratford - Oct - May - second Wed @ 5:15(PER0222)

Jubilee Christian Fellowship - 707 Downie Street, Stratford - Tues Feb 13 @ 5:15

Memorial Baptist Church 113 Bruce St, Stratford - Oct to May - fourth Thu @ 5:15

Hot meals delivered to healthy seniors, convalescing patients, shut-ins and others. Diabetic diets accommodated
